formulas.name: formula_myRule_1
formula_myRule_1_pmetrule
formula_myRule_3
formula_myRule_5

value.stringValue:
AND( OR( [Ticket__c].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Advising_Fulfillment', [Ticket__c].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Advising_Fulfillment_Care'), [Ticket__c].OwnerId != $User.Id
,OR( AND(ISNEW(),BEGINS([Ticket__c].OwnerId, "005")), AND( ISCHANGED([Ticket__c].OwnerId), BEGINS([Ticket__c].OwnerId, "005"))
),
NOT(ISPICKVAL([Ticket__c].Status__c ,'Closed')) )
